climbs.name: Mike Fink
climbs.fa: Dana Adler, Todd Gordon, Tom Burke, Cyndie Bransford, Dave Evans, Derrick & Jim Reinich, Mike & Jackeline Rossner, 3/1996

content.description: Leftmost route on the wall.  Face start up past a bolt, then diagonal up a right-leaning crack that peters out just before the top for a slabby finish.  Variation start right of the yucca and up the left side of the giant bottom chockstone boulder (felt a tad harder than the finish but could be easier for the very tall).
content.protection: Pro to 3", anchor at bolted rap rings.

climbs.name: I-Go-Go-E
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, C Bransford, Pat Nay, D Adler, Derrick & Jim Reinich, Karen Roseme, Mike & Jackeline Rossner, Tom Burke, Dave Evans, Kastle Lund, 3/1996

content.description: Start up the right side of the higher giant chockstone boulder.  Squeeze up the pinch gap to get atop that boulder, then transfer onto the main face.  Follow the obvious right-slanting dyke past a fixed pin and two more bolts to the top.  Optional medium cam or two if topping out via the same finishing crack as The Dungeon.
content.protection: 1 fixed pin, 2 bolts, optional medium cam or two, anchor at bolted rap rings.

content.description: Face start up the diagonal and horizontal features on the right side of the pit to reach an initially left-slanting seam.  Fight way up to a thankful lock and oodles of jugs above, as the crack straightens to the top.
content.protection: Pro to 2", gear anchor or set up at the bolted rap rings.
